title: misc/pprof: problem with pdf or svg generation
body:
by **ma.adameit**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. Create .prof file as described in http://blog.golang.org/profiling-go-programs
2. go tool pprof test.exe test.prof
3. top10

What is the expected output?
No errors after step 2 and proper output after step 3.


What do you see instead?
After 2. multiple "The system cannot find the file specified"
After 3. no function names, but memory addresses

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
The default one. "go build"

Which operating system are you using?
Windows 8 64bit

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go version go1.1.2 windows/amd64

Please provide any additional information below.

Compare with https://code.google.com/p/gperftools/issues/detail?id=317&;redir=1
